50#ifndef AM_HAL_RSTGEN_H
51#define AM_HAL_RSTGEN_H
52
53#ifdef __cplusplus
54extern "C"
55{
56#endif
57
58//*****************************************************************************
59//
60// RESET specific definitions.
61//
62//*****************************************************************************
63//**************************************
65//**************************************
66typedef enum
67{
68 AM_HAL_RESET_BROWNOUT_HIGH_ENABLE,
69 AM_HAL_RESET_WDT_RESET_ENABLE,
70 AM_HAL_RESET_BROWNOUT_HIGH_DISABLE,
71 AM_HAL_RESET_WDT_RESET_DISABLE
72} am_hal_reset_configure_e;
73
74//**************************************
76//**************************************
77typedef enum
78{
79 AM_HAL_RESET_CONTROL_SWPOR,
80 AM_HAL_RESET_CONTROL_SWPOI,
81 AM_HAL_RESET_CONTROL_STATUSCLEAR,
82 AM_HAL_RESET_CONTROL_TPIU_RESET
83} am_hal_reset_control_e;
84
85//**************************************
87//**************************************
88typedef enum
89{
90 AM_HAL_RESET_STATUS_EXTERNAL = RSTGEN_STAT_EXRSTAT_Msk,
91 AM_HAL_RESET_STATUS_POR = RSTGEN_STAT_PORSTAT_Msk,
92 AM_HAL_RESET_STATUS_BOD = RSTGEN_STAT_BORSTAT_Msk,
93 AM_HAL_RESET_STATUS_SWPOR = RSTGEN_STAT_SWRSTAT_Msk,
94 AM_HAL_RESET_STATUS_SWPOI = RSTGEN_STAT_POIRSTAT_Msk,
95 AM_HAL_RESET_STATUS_DEBUGGER = RSTGEN_STAT_DBGRSTAT_Msk,
96 AM_HAL_RESET_STATUS_WDT = RSTGEN_STAT_WDRSTAT_Msk,
97 AM_HAL_RESET_STATUS_BOUNREG = RSTGEN_STAT_BOUSTAT_Msk,
98 AM_HAL_RESET_STATUS_BOCORE = RSTGEN_STAT_BOCSTAT_Msk,
99 AM_HAL_RESET_STATUS_BOMEM = RSTGEN_STAT_BOFSTAT_Msk,
100 AM_HAL_RESET_STATUS_BOBLE = RSTGEN_STAT_BOBSTAT_Msk
101} am_hal_reset_status_e;
102
103//**************************************
105//**************************************
106typedef struct
107{
108 am_hal_reset_status_e
109 eStatus; // Return all status bits from RSTGEN.STAT
110 bool bEXTStat; // External reset
111 bool bPORStat; // Power-On reset
112 bool bBODStat; // Brown-Out reset
113 bool bSWPORStat; // SW Power-On reset or AIRCR reset
114 bool bSWPOIStat; // SW Power On Initialization reset
115 bool bDBGRStat; // Debugger reset
116 bool bWDTStat; // Watch Dog Timer reset
117 bool bBOUnregStat; // Unregulated Supply Brownout event
118 bool bBOCOREStat; // Core Regulator Brownout event
119 bool bBOMEMStat; // Memory Regulator Brownout event
120 bool bBOBLEStat; // BLE/Burst Regulator Brownout event
121} am_hal_reset_status_t;
122

125//
126#define AM_HAL_RESET_INTERRUPT_BODH RSTGEN_INTEN_BODH_Msk
127
129extern uint32_t gAmHalResetStatus;
130
